docs.title: Registration Output
docs.description: Registration output file containing the transformation from movable to destination.

docs.title: Mapped Movable Output
docs.description: Movable volume mapped and resampled at destination.

docs.title: Mapped Movable Header Output
docs.description: Movable volume aligned to destination (header only).

docs.title: Weights Output File
docs.description: Weights indicating outlier probabilities in destination space.

docs.title: Intensity Scale Output File
docs.description: Output text file containing the intensity scale value.

docs.title: Half Movable Volume
docs.description: Half-way movable volume resampled.

docs.title: Half Destination Volume
docs.description: Half-way destination volume resampled.

docs.title: Half Weights File
docs.description: Half-way weights resampled in halfway space.

docs.title: Half Movable LTA File
docs.description: Transform output from movable to half-way space.

docs.title: Half Destination LTA File
docs.description: Transform output from destination to half-way space.

docs.title: Movable Entropy Image
docs.description: Movable entropy image for ROBENT cost function.

docs.title: Destination Entropy Image
docs.description: Target entropy image for ROBENT cost function.

docs.title: mri_robust_register
docs.description: Inverse consistent registration of two volumes using robust and standard cost functions.

docs.title: Movable Volume
docs.description: Input movable volume to be aligned to target.

docs.title: Target Volume
docs.description: Input target volume.

docs.title: Output Registration
docs.description: Output registration (transform from mov to dst).

docs.title: Outlier Sensitivity
docs.description: Set outlier sensitivity manually for robust cost functions. Higher values mean less sensitivity.

docs.title: Automatic Sensitivity Detection
docs.description: Auto-detect good sensitivity for robust cost functions.

docs.title: Mapped Movable
docs.description: Output image: movable mapped and resampled at destination.

docs.title: Mapped Movable Header
docs.description: Output image: movable aligned to destination (no resampling, only adjusting header vox2ras).

docs.title: Weights Output
docs.description: Output weights (outlier probabilities) in destination space (0=regular,1=outlier).

docs.title: Invert Weights Map
docs.description: Weights (outlier) map will be inverted (0=outlier), as in earlier versions.

docs.title: Intensity Scale
docs.description: Estimate intensity scale factor.

docs.title: Intensity Scale Only
docs.description: Only perform intensity scaling (no transformation).

docs.title: Intensity Scale Output File
docs.description: Output text file for iscale value.

docs.title: Intensity Scale Input File
docs.description: Initial input text file for iscale value.

docs.title: Translation Only
docs.description: Find 3 parameter translation only.

docs.title: Affine Transform
docs.description: Find 12 parameter affine transform.

docs.title: Initial Transform File
docs.description: Use initial transform LTA on source.

docs.title: Initialize Orientation
docs.description: Use moments for orientation initialization.

docs.title: No Initial Transform
docs.description: Skip automatic transform initialization.

docs.title: Vox2Vox Output
docs.description: Output VOX2VOX LTA file.

docs.title: Cost Function
docs.description: Set cost function for registration.

docs.title: Entropy Radius
docs.description: With ROBENT: specify box radius for entropy computation.

docs.title: Entropy Correction
docs.description: With ROBENT: use better entropy computation that works on smaller boxes.

docs.title: Entropy Ball
docs.description: With ROBENT: use ball around voxel instead of box.

docs.title: Entropy Movable File
docs.description: With ROBENT: write movable entropy image.

docs.title: Powell Tolerance
docs.description: With MI, NMI etc: set Powell tolerance.

docs.title: Sobel Image Registration
docs.description: Register Sobel magnitude images.

docs.title: No Symmetry Mapping
docs.description: Do not map to half way space.

docs.title: Maximum Iterations
docs.description: Maximum number of iterations on each resolution.

docs.title: Entropy Destination File
docs.description: With ROBENT: write target entropy image.

docs.title: High Iterations Max
docs.description: Maximum number of iterations on highest resolution.

docs.title: EPS Iterations
docs.description: Stop iterations when transform update falls below specified RMS distance.

docs.title: No Multiscale
docs.description: Process highest resolution only (no multiscale).

docs.title: Max Size
docs.description: Specify largest voxel dimension for gaussian pyramid.

docs.title: Min Size
docs.description: Specify smallest voxel dimension for gaussian pyramid.

docs.title: Weight Limit
docs.description: (Expert) sets maximal outlier limit for --satit.

docs.title: Subsample Dimension Limit
docs.description: Subsample if dimension is greater than the specified value on all axes.

docs.title: Convert to Float
docs.description: Convert images to float internally.

docs.title: White Background Movable
docs.description: Assume white background in MOV for padding.

docs.title: White Background Destination
docs.description: Assume white background in DST for padding.

docs.title: Convert to UCHAR
docs.description: Convert inputs to UCHAR with rescale and histogram cropping.

docs.title: Mask Movable
docs.description: Mask movable image with mask file.

docs.title: Mask Destination
docs.description: Mask destination image with mask file.

docs.title: Half Movable
docs.description: Outputs half-way movable (resampled in halfway space).

docs.title: Half Destination
docs.description: Outputs half-way destination (resampled in halfway space).

docs.title: Half Weights
docs.description: Outputs half-way weights (resampled in halfway space).

docs.title: Half Movable LTA
docs.description: Outputs transform from movable to half-way space.

docs.title: Half Destination LTA
docs.description: Outputs transform from destination to half-way space.

docs.title: Debug Mode
docs.description: Show debug output.

docs.title: Verbosity Level
docs.description: Verbosity level: 0 (quiet), 1 (normal), 2 (detail).

docs.title: mri_robust_register
docs.description: Inverse consistent registration of two volumes using robust and standard cost functions.
